text:
@GOPLeader @realDonaldTrump @HouseGOP @SteveScalise @RepLizCheney @MacTXPress @RodneyDavis On what planet, exactly? Yesterday = 41,586 new positives. It is an ingregious misuse of one’s power and influence to purposefully mislead the people they are sworn to serve and protect. (Don’t trust this source? Check any other; the numbers are the same.)
